biography_text: MITCHELL, Paul, a Representative from Michigan; May 8, 1961; B.A., Michigan State University, Lansing, Mich., 1978; businessman; business executive; member of the St. Clair, Mich., city council; unsuccessful candidate for nomination to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
